item.title: *CORRECTED* You Can Help Right a Massive Wrong
item.description: CORRECTION & APOLOGY_ I am so sorry to you and to Senator Eric Schmitt for misrepresenting his position on HB466. Senator Schmitt’s office tells me that he has no intention of filibustering this bill. He went on to say that he agrees in principle with the bill’s intent and may actually support it, depending on the language. _ Please accept my apology and help me make it right. Please call or write Senator Schmitt’s office (below) and tell him Thank You.
